verses.name: 1 Samuel 8:12
verses.text: And he will appoint him captains over thousands, and captains over fifties; and will set them to ear his ground, and to reap his harvest, and to make his instruments of war, and instruments of his chariots.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 8:13
verses.text: And he will take your daughters to be confectionaries, and to be cooks, and to be bakers.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 8:14
verses.text: And he will take your fields, and your vineyards, and your oliveyards, even the best of them, and give them to his servants.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 8:15
verses.text: And he will take the tenth of your seed, and of your vineyards, and give to his officers, and to his servants.
